title: Telangana’s AI varsity to begins ops in next two months, says IT minister

title: AI can be a powerful substitute teacher for next generation of medical students
description: In an increasingly acute surgeon shortage, artificial intelligence could help fill the gap, coaching medical students as they practice surgical techniques.
content:

title: Clio's Fastcase sues rival legal tech firm Alexi
description: Legal technology firm Fastcase has sued its rival Alexi, accusing the company of breaching a data licensing agreement, misappropriating trade secrets and infringing trademarks as it vied to scale up an artificial-intelligence-powered research platform for lawyers.

title: AI becomes a political wedge issue, creating odd bedfellows across parties
description: Artificial intelligence is increasingly emerging as a key wedge issue — not between the major political parties, but within them.

title: How China’s Drive to Win the AI Race is Opening Opportunities for Business Leaders
description: Affordable AI models, government investment, and widespread acceptance of artificial intelligence tools will open the door to new opportunities for business leaders globally.
